title: Giribandhu Tea Estate Corporation Scandal
description: Major financial irregularities discovered in the state-owned tea corporation involving misappropriation of funds allocated for infrastructure development and employee welfare programs.
officialInvolved: Managing Director Ram Bahadur Thapa, Finance Director Sita Kumari Sharma

title: Road Construction Contract Fraud
description: Inflated contracts and substandard materials used in highway construction project, resulting in significant financial losses and compromised road quality.
officialInvolved: Project Director Hari Prasad Poudel, Procurement Officer Kamala Devi Shrestha

title: Medical Equipment Procurement Scandal
description: Overpriced medical equipment purchased during COVID-19 pandemic with suspected kickbacks to procurement officials.
officialInvolved: Joint Secretary Dr. Bishnu Prasad Regmi, Procurement Committee Chairman Laxmi Narayan Joshi

title: Education Ministry Scholarship Fraud
description: Fake scholarship recipients and ghost students identified in government scholarship programs, with funds diverted to personal accounts.
officialInvolved: Under Secretary Ganga Prasad Adhikari, Scholarship Section Chief Radha Krishna Bhattarai

title: Local Government Land Grab
description: Municipal officials illegally allocated public land to private developers at below-market rates in exchange for personal benefits.
officialInvolved: Mayor Man Bahadur Gurung, Land Revenue Officer Dil Maya Tamang

title: Hydropower Project Kickbacks
description: Senior officials received substantial kickbacks for approving environmentally questionable hydropower projects without proper impact assessments.
officialInvolved: Energy Secretary Surya Bahadur Thapa, Environmental Assessment Director Prem Lal Maharjan

title: Airport Construction Overruns
description: Massive cost overruns in regional airport construction with evidence of inflated invoices and phantom contractors.
officialInvolved: Airport Development Committee Chairman Keshav Raj Pandey, Chief Engineer Sarita Devi Karki

title: Customs Department Bribery Ring
description: Systematic bribery scheme at major border crossings allowing illegal imports and tax evasion in exchange for regular payments.
officialInvolved: Customs Chief Tek Bahadur Rana, Deputy Chief Sunita Kumari Yadav

title: Forest Department Illegal Logging
description: Forest officials accepting bribes to allow illegal logging operations in protected forest areas, causing significant environmental damage.
officialInvolved: District Forest Officer Narayan Prasad Ghimire, Range Post In-charge Mina Devi Chaudhary

title: Municipality Water Supply Fraud
description: Inflated costs and substandard materials in municipal water supply project, with evidence of collusion between officials and contractors.
officialInvolved: Water Supply Division Head Krishna Bahadur Magar, Technical Officer Geeta Devi Shrestha

title: Police Equipment Procurement Scam
description: Overpriced and defective equipment purchased for police forces with suspected involvement of senior police officials in the procurement process.
officialInvolved: DIG Rajesh Kumar Singh, Procurement Section Chief Inspector Anita Devi Karki

title: Agricultural Subsidy Misappropriation
description: Fake farmer registrations and ghost beneficiaries in agricultural subsidy programs, with funds diverted to personal accounts of agricultural officials.
officialInvolved: Joint Secretary Bhim Prasad Regmi, Subsidy Distribution Officer Kamala Devi Paudel
